title: Monitor and troubleshoot automated tasks
goal: Check logs and execution history of scheduled tasks

steps.observation:
Nov 13 00:00:01 server systemd[1]: Started Weekly Report Generator.
Nov 13 00:00:45 server systemd[1]: weekly_report.service: Succeeded.

args: success=$(journalctl -u weekly_report.service --since '30 days ago' --no-pager | grep -c 'Succeeded'); failed=$(journalctl -u weekly_report.service --since '30 days ago' --no-pager | grep -c 'Failed'); echo "Success=$success Failed=$failed"

success_condition: Verified daily backup runs at 3 AM, weekly report has 100% success rate (4/4 executions)
